title: Rudy Giuliani, Jenna Ellis Are Subpoenaed by Jan. 6 Committee
sub_head: Panel investigating Capitol riot seeks records and testimony from Trump associates
body:
WASHINGTON—The committee investigating last year’s attack on the U.S. Capitol said it has issued subpoenas to longtime Donald Trump adviser Rudy Giuliani, the former president’s campaign lawyer Jenna Ellis and two other people who the panel said participated in attempts to disrupt or delay the certification of the 2020 election results.
The other subpoenaed figures are pro-Trump lawyer Sidney Powell and former Trump campaign adviser Boris Epshteyn. The committee is seeking records by Feb. 1 and testimony in depositions by Feb. 8.
